modName: Alexs Amusing Arcanum - Zombie Apocalypse and Pokeballs
summary: This mod adds a very unique spell to the game, a Pokeball! You can throw one and catch and creature, and then if you drop the ball that creature will come out to fight for you. If you pick the ball up again, the monster goes back inside. More spells to come, including a zombie apocalypse spell!
descriptionHtml:
There is a tome for the pokeball spell on top of Farengar's desk in Dragonsreach. You can have up to six pokemon at a time. I have not yet added the ability to get rid of pokemon and add new ones, so be careful in your choices. That said, its a pretty amusing spell. Have fun!


Now there is also the Zombie Apocalypse Spell!
Simply cast Living Death at an Actor, and eventually they will die. (It is a very deadly spell.) They will then resurrect as a zombie who fights for you. The clever bit is, anyone who dies to a zombie becomes one (well, almost always). Cast it in the middle of whiterun and behold the chaos!
The spell tome is located on Farengar's desk in Dragonsreach.
author: Alex Ducey
